attributes.action: LOWER age for smear testing ASAP!
attributes.additional_details: Well in all honesty what other place is best to go too for this sort of stuff? I am hoping that they take this seriously and make a change since they have all the power to do so!
attributes.background: I want the government Parliament to take this petition seriously ! For the nature of all young women struggling daily with health issues and symptoms that require a smear test but are not given the chance as they are ( too young )

rejection.details:
The appropriate age at which screening for cervical cancer should begin is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Fund cervical screening at 20 as opposed to 25': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612372

'Fund annual cervical screening from the age of 18': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605244

'Fund annual cervical screening from age 16 or when first sexually active': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605372
